name: LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 Shared File
summary: Learn about .EV3S files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: To export an EV3P program as an EV3S file:
Click the wrench icon in the upper left of the Project screen in the application.
Select the EV3P file you want to export as an EV3S file.
Click Export at the bottom of the window, name your file, choose the save location, and click Save.

instructions: You can open EV3S files with the LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 (the Home and Education versions) in Windows or macOS.
However, you cannot double-click the file to open it, you must import it. For example, to import the EV3S file:
Click the wrench icon in the top-left of the Project screen in the application.
Select Import in the bottom of the window.
Navigate to the EV3S file, select it, and click Open.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
